reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2004, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here for one night. The hotel was OK in most regards. The room was clean and well furnished and the evening meal that we had was excellent . There are two drawbacks however:-
reviews.title: Mixed feelings

likes.disliked: — No sea swimming and the nighttime around the hotel

reviews.title: Worst Wedding Venue in Africa
reviews.text: 1) You are advised not to swim because there are no shark nets and, I have to say there were a number of unsavoury looking prople wandering around on the beach so I would not have felt safe from humans let alone marine life. This was very disappointing as we had completed a our own independent tour of the Zulu battlefields and stayed in a game park as well. I was so looking forward to a swim !
